summary: THE AIRBAG LIGHT ILLUMINATED WHILE DRIVING.  NOW THE CRUISE CONTROL, RADIO, HORN AND THE FUNCTIONS ON THE STEERING WHEEL ARE INOPERATIVE.  THE CAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM IS UNKNOWN.   *NLM  THE MECHANIC STATED THAT THE CLOCKSPRING WAS BAD.  THE WAS A RECALL FOR THE 1996-98 MODELS.  THE CONSUMER FOUND THAT SIX OTHER SAME MAKE/MODELS HAVE EXPERIENCED THE SAME PROBLEM WITH THE 99 MODEL AND FELT THAT THIS MODEL SHOULD BE INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  RECALL#02V293000  SCC
